description.en:
Disapproved by his parents, Eunjun now lives apart from his family for the first time in his life.
Somehow electric appliances don't work as they should when Eunjun lays his hands on them.
Fortunately, there's an old electrical repair shop nearby where he became a regular.
Jihu comes to help his father and notices Eunjun spending more time at the shop than he needs to.
